xades4j.production.SignedDataObjects

  • Packages that use SignedDataObjects 
    Package Description
    xades4j.production
    Support for signature production.
    xades4j.properties
    Types that represent the different XAdES qualifying properties.

      Registers a ResourceResolver to be used when signing the current set of data objects.
